mapper.sql: id, form_name, category, sys_owner, is_new, version, fk_tenant_id, create_time, create_user_id, update_time, update_user_id
mapper.insert: insert into cm_form (id, form_name, category, sys_owner, is_new, version, fk_tenant_id, create_time, create_user_id, update_time, update_user_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{formName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isNew,jdbcType=BIT}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fkTenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

mapper.update:
update cm_form
form_name = #{formName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sys_owner = #{sysOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_new = #{isNew,jdbcType=BIT},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fk_tenant_id = #{fkTenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update cm_form set form_name = #{formName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_owner = #{sysOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_new = #{isNew,jdbcType=BIT}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fk_tenant_id = #{fkTenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select max(f.version) from cm_form f WHERE f.fk_tenant_id = #{fkTenantId} AND f.category=#{category} and f.sys_owner = #{sysOwner}
mapper.update: update cm_form set is_new = false where category = #{category} and sys_owner = #{sysOwner} and fk_tenant_id = #{tenantId}
